channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Regional Airlines Are Doing Terribly. They Need a Recession.
item.description: Despite some green shoots, most regional contractors will probably keep struggling until mainline airlines have an incentive to use smaller planes aga...

item.title: This 34-year-old supersized her salary with her third career
item.description: Megan Lewis-Taylor served in the military and law enforcement before going back to college to pursue engineering.

item.title: Don't Count on a Megadeal to Save Intel
item.description: Qualcomm or any other buyer would get a design business that has lost market share and a fab business bleeding money

item.title: Levi’s CEO says goal of $9 billion to $10 billion in annual revenue by 2027 will be pushed back
item.description: Levi Strauss & Co.’s goal of generating $9 billion to $10 billion in annual revenue by 2027 will be pushed back as the denim-clothing company is still...

item.title: A Private-Equity Executive Pushes for Workers' Stake in U.S. Companies
item.description: A co-head of KKR’s global private-equity business wants to change a 1974 law governing employee stock-ownership plans.

item.title: Eli Lilly’s Alzheimer’s treatment Kisunla wins approval in Japan
item.description: Japan, with its rapidly aging population, is expected to have more than 5 million patients with dementia by 2030. Alzheimer’s is the most common form ...

item.title: A Star FTX Witness Turned Romance Novelist Learns Her Fate
item.description: Caroline Ellison, former crypto executive who contributed to a multibillion-dollar fraud, will get her sentence Tuesday afternoon.

item.title: Oil gains after back-to-back losses as China announces stimulus measures
item.description: Oil futures rose on Tuesday, looking to post their first gain after back-to-back losses after China announced a range of stimulus measures aimed at bo...

item.title: They Bought Homes With Their Friends---and Now They Want Out
item.description: Co-owners face tough choices on how to exit arrangements they entered with friends during the pandemic.

item.title: Biogen and Belgian partner UCB announce positive data from late-stage trial of lupus treatment
item.description: Biogen Inc.’s stock rose 2% early Tuesday, after the company and Belgian partner UCB announced positive results in a late-stage trial
